timeline.message: Refactor (Java): Refactoring code based on code quality suggestions. We should not have public mutable fields, especially if they are not being used.

timeline.bodyText: Can we add a comment here as to why this is comented out?
timeline.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: Alternatively I can delete this. Having public mutable fields is being reported as a vulnerability and this field was not even being referenced anywhere. So I commented it out to remove the vulnerability until we determine what the purpose of this String array was.
replies.author: jamesrichard91

replies.bodyText: I would delete it. If we need it back we can just get it from the files history.
replies.author: bamandel
